inclusion.criterion: Patient with HBL: fasting LDL-C ≤ 50 mg/dl.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Relative with HBL: fasting LDL-C ≤ 80 mg/dl and/or Apo B ≤ 50 mg/dl.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: At least one related family case suffering from HBL.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Family history is positive for DM type 1 in his uncle and his grandfather.

inclusion.criterion: All subjects, including familial non-affected cases, must give written consent (dated and signed) to participate at the constitution of biobank.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of lipid-lowering drugs (statins, fibrates, ezetimibe, bile-acid sequestering resin) or nutraceuticals known to affect lipids.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient screened within an extreme metabolic disturbance (emergency situations, sepsis, hospitalization in intensive care unit).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Anemia related to thalassemia or sickle cell disease.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 25-year-old man with type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago. He presents to the clinic with shortness of breath and fatigue during activities.
